Class TlsECDHKeyExchange

  • java.lang.Object

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TlsKeyExchange

    public class TlsECDHKeyExchange
extends AbstractTlsKeyExchange
    (D)TLS ECDH key exchange (see RFC 4492).
